title: How to keep apps running in the Background ?
content: I've recently got the pixel 3a, when setting up the phone I opted out of allowing all apps to continue running in the background however now my Fitbit wont sync with my phone and this seems to be the reason why. How do I change my preferences so that I can allow certain apps to run in the background?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
